original_text: And I wrote as I did, so that when I came I might not suffer pain from those who should have made me rejoice, for I felt sure of all of you, that my joy would be the joy of you all.
korean_text: 내가 이같이 쓴 것은 내가 갈 때에 마땅히 나를 기쁘게 할 자로부터 도리어 근심을 얻을까 염려함이요 또 너희 모두에 대한 나의 기쁨이 너희 모두의 기쁨인 줄 확신함이로라

sentences.original_text: And I wrote as I did
from those who should have made me rejoice
for I felt sure of all of you
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 나는 너희 모두를 확신했기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: that my joy would be the joy of you all
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 기쁨이 너희 모두의 기쁨이 될 것이라는
